data.title: Pierce Brosnan
data.meta_description: "'The Son' — co-created by Philipp Meyer, who wrote the Pulitzer Prize–nominated novel that inspired this series, Brian McGreevy, and Lee Shipman, both of whom worked on the Netflix adaptation of McGreevy’s novel Hemlock Grove — is a handsomely shot, well-acted, and respectable piece of work.” - Vulture
data.text:
All 55 Pierce Brosnan Films, Ranked

I love Pierce Brosnan. You love Pierce Brosnan. The world loves Pierce Brosnan. We’re living through the Brosnaissance. Don’t try to fight it. It’s happening. Wherever you look, he’s there, somehow smouldering and twinkling at the same time – or else his handsome large adult sons are, ready to carry on the noble family tradition of spreading easy charm...

‘Poisoning Paradise’: Pierce Brosnan 007 hunts down agrichemical villains

James Bond has clashed with bad guys like Dr. No, Goldfinger and Spectre’s Ernst Stavro Blofeld. In Poisoning Paradise, 007 meets the ultimate Bond villain: Biotech companies such as Monsanto and DuPont, whose pesticides and GMO experimental projects are turning people into lab rats at Kauai. Read more

Pierce Brosnan Urges Dickinson College Class of 2019 to ‘Make Something That Matters’

Dickinson College honored 597 graduating seniors—the largest graduating class in the college’s history—on Sunday, May 19, as Commencement speaker, actor, producer and environmental activist Pierce Brosnan urged them to “make something that matters.” Read more

POISONING PARADISE Now Available on iTunes, Amazon, YouTube and Google Play!

Berlin: Pierce Brosnan to Star in Heist Film ‘The Misfits’ (Exclusive)

Directed by action veteran Renny Harlin, the movie is set in the Middle East and follows a master criminal caught up in a major gold heist. Pierce Brosnan has signed on to star in the upcoming gold heist thriller The Misfits. Directed by action veteran Renny Harlin (Die Hard 2, Skip Trace), the project will...

Pierce Brosnan shares a glimpse of ‘The Misfits’ set in Abu Dhabi

The actor posted a snap of the heist thriller cast as stars finished their first week of shooting. It was announced earlier this month that The Misfits would be filmed largely in the UAE, and now film buffs have had their first peek at the set in Abu Dhabi. The heist thriller, which is helmed by Die Hard...

YOUR VOICE MATTERS – A short film by Paris Brosnan

Pierce Brosnan‘s son Paris is doing his part to help encourage young voters to register and hit the polls. The 17-year-old son of Brosnan and his wife Keely Shaye Smith wrote, directed and produced the video “Your Voice Matters.” Read More

Pierce Brosnan To The Host 7th Annual “Breakthrough Prize” Ceremony

The Annual, Star-Studded Ceremony that Celebrates Science and Scientific Achievement To Feature an “In Memoriam” Tribute to the Late Stephen Hawking. Ceremony to Air Live at 10 PM ET / 7 PM PT. Read more
